get.description: Get the overall health of the application based on the services it needs.

schema.title: Response List Jobs Workflows Api V1 Jobs  Get

post.description:
This endpoint accepts both `application/json` and `form/multipart`
requests.

### `application/json` requests

In this mode, the endpoint uses the JSON payload as the job's initial data.

### `form/multipart` requests

In this mode, the endpoint accepts at most one optional `application/json`
part (or file) named `data` as the job's initial data.

Other parts (or files) are attached to the job in collections matching
their part name; this mechanism is not limited to what is exposed in the
Swagger schema.

tags.name: Workflow Jobs
tags.description:
Set of endpoints used to guide, monitor and mutate payloads
through workflows.

tags.name: Workflows Definition
tags.description:
Set of endpoints used to configure and manage workflows.

The objects involved:

- Workflows
- Steps
- Transitions

Together they form a directed graph-like structure that
*Workflow Jobs* will have to follow in a controlled and
deterministic way.
